verses.verse: <S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> [covenant] <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1345>regulations<s%> of <S%G2999>divine<s%> <S%G2999>worship<s%> and the <S%G2886>earthly<s%> <S%G40>sanctuary.<s%>

For there was a <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> <S%G2680>prepared,<s%> the <S%G4413>outer<s%> <S%G4387>one,<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> [were] the <S%G3087>lampstand<s%> and the <S%G5132>table<s%> and the <S%G4286>sacred<s%> <S%G740>bread;<s%> <S%G3748>this<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G40>place.<s%>
And <S%G3326>behind<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2665>veil,<s%> there was a <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> which is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> of <S%G40>Holies,<s%>

<S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2369>altar<s%> of <S%G2369>incense<s%> and the <S%G2787>ark<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G4028>covered<s%> on <S%G3840>all<s%> <S%G3840>sides<s%> with <S%G5553>gold,<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> [was] a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4713>jar<s%> <S%G2192>holding<s%> the <S%G3131>manna,<s%> and Aaron's <S%G4464>rod<s%> which <S%G985>budded,<s%> and the <S%G4109>tables<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant.<s%>

And <S%G5231>above<s%> it [were] the <S%G5502>cherubim<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2683>overshadowing<s%> the <S%G2435>mercy<s%> <S%G2435>seat;<s%> but of <S%G3739>these<s%> <S%G3739>things<s%> we <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> in <S%G3313>detail.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> have been <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G2680>prepared,<s%> the <S%G2409>priests<s%> are <S%G1223>continually<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G1524>entering<s%> the <S%G4413>outer<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G2005>performing<s%> the <S%G2999>divine<s%> <S%G2999>worship,<s%>

but into the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> [enters], <S%G530>once<s%> a <S%G1763>year,<s%> not <S%G5565>without<s%> [taking] <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4374>offers<s%> for <S%G1438>himself<s%> and for the <S%G51>sins<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> committed in <S%G51>ignorance.<s%>

The <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> [is] <S%G1213>signifying<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> that the <S%G3598>way<s%> into the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G40>place<s%> has not <S%G3380>yet<s%> been <S%G5319>disclosed,<s%> while the <S%G4413>outer<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> is <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G4714>standing,<s%>

<S%G3748>which<s%> [is] a <S%G3850>symbol<s%> for the <S%G1764>present<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%> <S%G2596>Accordingly<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> and <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> are <S%G4374>offered<s%> which <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5048>make<s%> the <S%G3000>worshiper<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%> in <S%G4893>conscience,<s%>

since they [relate] <S%G3440>only<s%> to <S%G1033>food<s%> and <S%G4188>drink<s%> and <S%G1313>various<s%> <S%G909>washings,<s%> <S%G1345>regulations<s%> for the <S%G4561>body<s%> <S%G1945>imposed<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> a <S%G2540>time<s%> of <S%G1357>reformation.<s%>

But when <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3854>appeared<s%> [as] a <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> of the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>things<s%> to <S%G1096>come,<s%> [He entered] <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3173>greater<s%> and <S%G5046>more<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> not <S%G5499>made<s%> with <S%G5499>hands,<s%> that is to say, not of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2937>creation;<s%>

and not <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5131>goats<s%> and <S%G3448>calves,<s%> but <S%G1223>through<s%> His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> He <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G40>place<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%> for <S%G2178>all,<s%> having <S%G2147>obtained<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G3085>redemption.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5131>goats<s%> and <S%G5022>bulls<s%> and the <S%G4700>ashes<s%> of a <S%G1151>heifer<s%> <S%G4472>sprinkling<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who have been <S%G2840>defiled,<s%> <S%G37>sanctify<s%> for the <S%G2514>cleansing<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%>

<S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> will the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> <S%G299>without<s%> <S%G299>blemish<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> your <S%G4893>conscience<s%> from <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> to <S%G3000>serve<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>?

And for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> He is the <S%G3316>mediator<s%> of a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> in <S%G3704>order<s%> that since a <S%G2288>death<s%> has <S%G1096>taken<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> for the <S%G629>redemption<s%> of the <S%G3847>transgressions<s%> that were [committed] <S%G1909>under<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who have been <S%G2564>called<s%> may <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance.<s%>
For <S%G3699>where<s%> a <S%G1242>covenant<s%> is, there must of <S%G318>necessity<s%> be the <S%G2288>death<s%> of the one who <S%G1303>made<s%> it.

For a <S%G1242>covenant<s%> is <S%G949>valid<s%> [only] when men are <S%G3498>dead,<s%> for it is <S%G3379>never<s%> in <S%G2480>force<s%> <S%G3753>while<s%> the one who <S%G1303>made<s%> it <S%G2198>lives.<s%>
<S%G3606>Therefore<s%> <S%G3761>even<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> [covenant] was not <S%G1457>inaugurated<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

For when <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> had been <S%G2980>spoken<s%> by <S%G3475>Moses<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G3448>calves<s%> and the <S%G5131>goats,<s%> with <S%G5204>water<s%> and <S%G2847>scarlet<s%> <S%G2053>wool<s%> and <S%G5301>hyssop,<s%> and <S%G4472>sprinkled<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%>
<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1781>commanded<s%> you."

And in the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>way<s%> he <S%G4472>sprinkled<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of the <S%G3009>ministry<s%> with the <S%G129>blood.<s%>

And <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> [one may] <S%G4975>almost<s%> [say], <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G2511>cleansed<s%> with <S%G129>blood,<s%> and <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G130>shedding<s%> of <S%G130>blood<s%> there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G859>forgiveness.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> it was <S%G318>necessary<s%> for the <S%G5262>copies<s%> of the things in the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> to be <S%G2511>cleansed<s%> with <S%G3778>these,<s%> but the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G2032>things<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> with <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3778>these.<s%>

For <S%G5547>Christ<s%> did not <S%G1525>enter<s%> a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G40>place<s%> <S%G5499>made<s%> with <S%G5499>hands,<s%> a [mere] <S%G499>copy<s%> of the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G228>one,<s%> but into <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G846>itself,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> to <S%G1718>appear<s%> in the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for us;

<S%G3761>nor<s%> was it that He should <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> <S%G4178>often,<s%> as the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1525>enters<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G40>place<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> by <S%G1763>year<s%> with <S%G129>blood<s%> not his <S%G245>own.<s%>

<S%G1893>Otherwise,<s%> He would have <S%G1163>needed<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world;<s%> but <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> at the <S%G4930>consummation<s%> of the <S%G165>ages<s%> He has been <S%G5319>manifested<s%> to <S%G115>put<s%> <S%G115>away<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> by the <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> of <S%G846>Himself.<s%>
And <S%G2596>inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745><s%> as it is <S%G606>appointed<s%> for <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> and <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> [comes] <S%G2920>judgment,<s%>

<S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> having been <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> to <S%G399>bear<s%> the <S%G266>sins<s%> of <S%G4183>many,<s%> shall <S%G3708>appear<s%> a <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>time<s%> for <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> [reference to] <S%G266>sin,<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G553>eagerly<s%> <S%G553>await<s%> Him.
